name: Frog Bazooka
description:
Frog Bazooka is a prototype I made to get ideas. I had ~2 days to make a game with the theme Bazooka and the limitations one game lasts a minute and sandbox. The game doesn't have any audio.

How To Play

Survive one minute and score the maximum Mayhem. If you destroy several items/mobs in the same explosion you gain bonus points. Be careful however, your explosion kill you too.

Controls
  • Move : WASD / ZQSD / the arrows
  • Aim & Shoot : Mouse

---

Mostly made with Godot 3.2.1 and Aseprite.
